sense.def:
To command someone to do something
pomeni nekomu ukazati, naj nekaj stori.

seg.quote: She commanded me to lie down and relax.
They waited for their master's command.

sense.def:
To command something
pomeni nekaj ukazati.

seg.quote: The king had commanded his presence at court.

sense.def:
To command something
pomeni dobiti poslušnost ali pozornost zaradi svoje priljubljenosti ali pomembnosti.

seg.quote: She was no longer in a position to command obedience or admiration.

sense.def:
To command part of an army, navy, or air force
pomeni voditi neki vojaški oddelek kopenskih, pomorskih ali zračnih sil.

seg.quote: He commanded a regiment of cavalry in Algiers.
He had been in command of HMS Churchill for a year.

sense.def:
Command
je nadzor nad določenimi okoliščinami.

seg.quote: He was looking more relaxed and in command than ever before.

sense.def:
One's command of something
je človekovo poznavanje nečesa in sposobnost, da tisto uporablja.
